subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Trail Blazers, already stocked with young talent, were the big winners in the N.B.A. draft lottery where the three teams that finished with the worst records were bumped from the top draft spots.
snippet: The Trail Blazers, already stocked with young talent, were the big winners in the N.B.A. draft lottery where the three teams that finished with the worst records were bumped from the top draft spots.
